name: Soporo: Fishing In Ruin Demo
description:
A catgirl goes fishing! A demo of the fishing minigame in Soporo: Wonderland In Ruin.

If you'd like, show up to the discord at https://discord.gg/heVZsGh or follow the game on twitter at https://twitter.com/TeamEssell for all the latest development news!

Default Controls (You can change these in the options menu!) (Note: Some options in the options menu do nothing in the fishing minigame.)

Move: Arrow Keys

Pull: Z

Reel: X

Skill: C

Menu: Escape
